item.title: Setting up for success
item.description: Setting up for success Tip #1 Have something that only gets done during treatments, and rotate a few things often. Check out our From our kids to your kids page for ideas that would work for you! Tip #2 Get a good organization system, in a convenient location. I hope to add a few cabinets that would work to fit the vests without modifications. If the sky is the limit or if you are handy, do a custom built-in.
